snippet: The Obama administration moved to clarify a provision related to federal funds provided under the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: Obama administration outlines measure to combat discrimination against transgender patients across health care system; advocates hail proposal which expands definition of sex discrimination in Affordable Care Act to include gender identity; regulation would require many insurers to lift blanket bans on gender reassignment services or risk loss of federal funding.

byline.original: By ABBY GOODNOUGH and MARGOT SANGER-KATZ

lead_paragraph: The Obama administration moved to clarify a provision related to federal funds provided under the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: Health Care Rules Proposed to Shield Transgender Patients From Bias
headline.print_headline: Health Care Rules Proposed to Shield Transgender Patients From Bias

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
